data.context: Here's a statistic that should keep you awake at night: The average Sydney [Service Business](/blog/how-to-write-google-ads-copy-that-converts-for-sydney-service-businesses/) converts just 2.3% of their website visitors into enquiries. That means for every 100 potential customers who visit your site, 97 leave without taking any action.
